Description:
Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Network Connections Discovery Via Net.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((process_path like '%\net.exe' or process_path like '%\net1.exe') and (original_file_name = 'net.exe' or original_file_name = 'net1.exe')) and ((command like '% use' or command like '% sessions') and (command like '% use %' or command like '% sessions %')))
